thread.title: [ Software ] Open Question : Is it possible to change Win10 from 32 to 64 bit on the free upgrade?

title: [ Software ] Open Question : Is it possible to change Win10 from 32 to 64 bit on the free upgrade?
text: Next Is it possible to change Win10 from 32 to 64 bit on the free upgrade? As I was trying to remove AVG ZEN I had to find out what my computer operates on 32 or 64 bit? Surprise- apparently my computer is running OS 32 but the processor is 64bit...I have no idea what to do. I just followed the onscreen commands during upgrade. I do have a lot of trouble with this computer since the... show more As I was trying to remove AVG ZEN I had to find out what my computer operates on 32 or 64 bit? Surprise- apparently my computer is running OS 32 but the processor is 64bit...I have no idea what to do. I just followed the onscreen commands during upgrade. I do have a lot of trouble with this computer since the upgrade though and getting the start menu open is an exercise in patience to turn it off. "Please Y.A. Community, you're my only hope." Follow
